mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recent_check (users_idx, pblanc_no, viewed_at, house_type) VALUES (#{usersIdx}, #{pblancNo}, NOW(), #{houseType}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE viewed_at = NOW(), house_type = VALUES(house_type)
mapper.select: SELECT users_idx, pblanc_no , house_type FROM recent_check WHERE users_idx = #{usersIdx} ORDER BY viewed_at DESC LIMIT 5
